turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to order a short black and white mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a short black and white mocha with nonfat milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i can't hear you, there is a loud noise coming from your microphone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of flavors can I add to the mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can add chocolate, vanilla and strawberry syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll keep the mocha the way it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks in san antonio.
